name: Battle Survival Gangster: Boss
description:
Battle Survival Gangster: Boss Game is game about gangsters and a city that scares and fascinates. Become a dangerous thug and do whatever you want in the grand gangster game about gangsters of crime. Gangster starts stealing cars and be lawlessness crime guy on streets of the grand city. The epic battle of angry gangster vs.
Features:
- Shoot to kill enemies for survival in the crime city.
- Loads of quests to become a mafia lord of the gang war.
- Rush grab & steal auto cars like a real mobster in the town of Vegas.
- Auto car chase & shooting with the variety of weapons in action game.
- Roam around the streets for fights and stolen car mission.
